nodes.documentation:
@title BridgeBank
@dev Bank contract which coordinates asset-related functionality.
     CosmosBank manages the minting and burning of tokens which
     represent Cosmos based assets, while EthereumBank manages
     the locking and unlocking of Ethereum and ERC20 token assets
     based on Ethereum. WhiteList records the ERC20 token address 
     list that can be locked.*
nodes.name: BridgeBank

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Access restricted to the cosmos bridge"

arguments.value: Access restricted to the cosmos bridge

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Access restricted to the cosmos bridge"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Contract token allowances insufficient to complete this lock request"

arguments.value: Contract token allowances insufficient to complete this lock request

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Contract token allowances insufficient to complete this lock request"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ethereum deposits require the 'token' address to be the null address"

arguments.value: Ethereum deposits require the 'token' address to be the null address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ethereum deposits require the 'token' address to be the null address"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The transactions value must be equal the specified amount (in wei)"

arguments.value: The transactions value must be equal the specified amount (in wei)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The transactions value must be equal the specified amount (in wei)"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The Bank does not hold enough locked tokens to fulfill this request."

arguments.value: The Bank does not hold enough locked tokens to fulfill this request.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The Bank does not hold enough locked tokens to fulfill this request."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Insufficient ERC20 token balance for delivery."

arguments.value: Insufficient ERC20 token balance for delivery.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Insufficient ERC20 token balance for delivery."
